The project is done with a group of 2 students.
- Esad İsmail Tök - 21801679
- Elifnur Alsaç - 21601098

* The aplication to demonstrate the work done (myapp) can be generated by running make commnand. 
* make clean command clears the executable and unnecessary files.

* To run the application -> ./myapp <avoid-flag>

* If avoid-flag is 0 then there will be no deadlock avoidence. If it is 1 then there will be deadlock avoidence
* Both programs successfully runs and completes the simulations.
